DOC.brief_summary: The investigator design current study main objective determine whether Whole Body Vibration Training ( WBVT ) alone improve muscular force and/or modify functional capacity parameter severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) patient refer rehabilitation programme .
DOC.brief_title: Whole Body Vibration Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: severe COPD define postbronchodilator forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) / force vital capacity ( FVC ) < 0.7 FEV1 < 50 % predict , stable disease define exacerbation , hospital admission change treatment previous 3 month . significant respiratory disease ( bronchiectasis , lung fibrosis , asthma , etc ) , active smoking , severe cardiovascular , neurological , and/or metabolic pathology could interfere result , total hip , knee ankle arthroplasty , previous vitreous haemorrhage , severe alcoholism ( > 80 g/day ) severe malnutrition ( BMI < 19 Kg/m2 ) reduce risk fall dropout .
